data.name: Ignis Universia: Awakening of the Erudite Empress
data.detailed_description:
The Chosen must rise or the world shall perish in darkness!
But they never ask - Chosen by whom exactly?

The end of the world is nigh and the Chosen Sisters must rise to the occasion, yet again! But as the four heroines set out on a new quest, another threat rears its ugly head and the very prophecy that chose them is crumbling apart. How will they weather the return of Galgatax and the rise of the Erudite Empress? And - most importantly - is there cake at the end? Chocolate, whipped cream with those colourful bits, and some nice jam, thank you very much.

Today we're serving an epic mix of JRPG and Visual Novel with a seasoning of tongue-in-cheek story and a hefty dose of loving homage (which must be good because it sounds like a cheese).

  • 100% turn-based with no twitch-reflex gameplay.
  • Four Chosen Sisters with their own skills and special abilities.
  • All characters in the party all the time, no need to choose between the characters whom you like the most against who'd make the most effective combination.
  • Utilise the Friendship system to unleash super cute summons!
  • Not an angsty teenage protagonist boy in sight.
  • Only one of these bullet points uses an exclamation mark so you must know we're serious!


Nowhere is the cliché of all-conquering love and friendship more true than in the battle system of the Awakening of the Erudite Empress. By acting together, the Sisters can create combos and gain Friendship Points, which in turn allow them to summon powerful beasts such as the Derperus and Beavis the Hipster Beaver to their aid!



Combo Examples:

  • Enemies with the Wet condition really feel the cold from Mordina's Freezing Fingers of Doom!
  • Silvanna really knows her Icy Stare! The opponent might not dare hit her at all, having to direct all attacks at Zena, who has her Defence Up and gets a counterattack from Eleanna's Flames of Love!
  • Unbalanced enemies have their stats decreased and can get tripped over and lose their turn!
  • Get those crits in with the Seize Soul spell and net a quadruple Chosen Sisters Super Combo with Triple Trick!

More than that, Friendship Points also accumulate in the Genesis Shards, allowing the Chosen to learn new special abilities to annoy their ever-increasing roster of opponents with.



At the heart of the character progression in the game are the Genesis Shards, which can be equipped to the Chosen Sisters and grant new abilities to their wielders. Each Shard is tied to a single element and has one or more abilities, each for a different Sister, unlocked by unleashing combos with the others. Play around with various combinations to find the best ability synergies!




The abilities available to the Sisters depend on a complicated astrological divination system of orbits, whims of the gods and a cryptic arcane matrix of Ley lines, foxes and prank calls (remember those?), but for simplicity's sake, let's just say there are six different elements, four of which are available in each battle. Each Element Slot gives a Sister access to the ability in the Genesis Shard of the same element AND determines the character's place in the turn order. After acquiring the Null Necklace, you can select the order of the Sisters before the battle - and they can also switch places during the fight.



If you're still not sure, check out the first game in the series, it's completely free!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/694060/Ignis_Universia_Eternal_Sisters_Saga_DX/

data.short_description: Ignis Universia is a cute and funny JRPG and Visual Novel mix with a seasoning of tongue-in-cheek story that references to old genre classics. May contain references to stereotypes and clichés (RPG, fantasy, music, anime and small doses of other nerdy interests).
